mapper.select: SELECT c.CATEGORY_NAME as categoryName, SUM(i.INVEN_COUNT) as invenCount FROM INVENTORY i JOIN BREAD b ON i.BREAD_NO = b.BREAD_NO JOIN BREAD_CATEGORY c ON b.CATEGORY_NO = c.CATEGORY_NO GROUP BY c.CATEGORY_NAME ORDER BY c.CATEGORY_NAME
SELECT SUM(i.INVEN_COUNT * b.PRICE) as TOTAL_AMOUNT FROM INVENTORY i JOIN BREAD b ON i.BREAD_NO = b.BREAD_NO
